Yeah. They waited so damn long to release the skins that its like, it's cool that they're here, but the hype definitely isn't what it was.

It doesn't help that nearly half this year's team weren't great choices.
Ahri and Miss Fortune were poor choices IMHO, and giving Ahri the legendary of the set was even worse.

You can put stars and pink ribbons on anyone and it "fits the theme" so that's just a bullshit sellout excuse.
But poor Ahri only had 8 skins, have a heart will you!

I personally think Ahru fits the theme (still doesnt deserve it) but MF makes no freaking sense.  Soraka is a celestial and Ezreal is our anime boy.  Syndra deserved the legendary all the way.
That said im buying MF and Ez...

yet in the SG lore Ez still crushing on Lux and Lux also kinda likes him {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

She has a taunt towards him now.  "Are we supposed to be dating or something?  We've never even talked!"  They added it during her voice update.  I think it was more a joke about their lore changes though, they used to be friends, now theyve never met.
they never removed the line from the howling abyss guy though. I'm just gonna say they're still dating

"You people"? I don't see what's the problem with people asking for more Star Guardian skins. People talk about this skin line more than even the Project skins. Interest brings in money and money brings more content.

> [{quoted}](name=Lyseth,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=PZnt0ekw,comment-id=0004000000020000,timestamp=2017-09-06T19:02:16.608+0000)
>
> Come up with a good skin for him then I'll support it, presently only reason for wanting SG is "because Ez got it"

I legit want a SG Taric since he is a "guardian of life, love, and beauty" as the wiki puts it. That's prime grounds for mahou shojou-esque guy  if I've ever heard of one. Besides, magical boy genre has been growing in popularity in the past couple of years, so I expect there's money there. Now when it comes to Braum I get more shallow, because I literally just want to play Braum with a beautiful pink mustache. Sue me.

Star Guardian is a fair concept for a Taric skin now that Riot is including male champions. Two of his abilities are even related, Starlight's Touch & Cosmic Radiance. In his lore it even says "Taric ascended Mount Targon to find redemption, only to discover a higher calling among the stars". So I don't really see an issue, he at least has some relation to the theme :)
Can we agree that maybe Ezreal should of been the Tuxedo Mask of the Guardians?
Instant buy for me
